title: Hidden Brain: A Sneak Peek
description: Check out a few minutes of the latest podcast from NPR: Hidden Brain. Shankar Vedantam explores what happens when two people think they are talking about the same thing, but in reality are speeding down separate tracks. It usually doesn't end well.
author: ideas@hiddenbrain.org (Hidden Brain Media)
